Need an earlier release?

We moved them to The National Archives website, to keep this website as responsive as possible.

Please note: all historical data is still on this website.

Deaths

Deaths broken down by age, sex, area and cause of death sourced from the deaths register.

  • Unexpected Deaths

    Dataset | Released on 19 August 2015

    Unexpected deaths, i.e. deaths certified by a coroner, and infant deaths by selected causes in England and Wales for the period 2004 to 2012.

    Keywords: Unexplained,infant mortality,cot death,sudden infant death,SIDS

  • Deaths registered in England and Wales: 2016 (Latest release)

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 19 July 2017

    Annual data on death registrations contains death rates, cause of death data by sex and age and death registrations by area of residence and single year of age.

    Keywords: mortality, infant, male, female, area,mortality,infant,male,female,area

  • Deaths registered in England and Wales: 2015

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 13 July 2016

    Annual data on death registrations contains death rates, cause of death data by sex and age and death registrations by area of residence and single year of age.

    Keywords: mortality, infant, male, female, area,mortality,infant,male,female,area

  • Deaths involving MRSA in Wales: 2014 (Latest release)

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 3 September 2015

    Deaths where Meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) was mentioned on the death certificate by sex, age group and whether the death occured in hospital or elsewhere.

    Keywords: Meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, S. aureus, hospital infections, care home infections, superbug

  • Deaths Registered in England and Wales: 2014

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 15 July 2015

    Deaths, stillbirths and infant mortality including death rates, causes, age, and area of residence.

    Keywords: mortality, infant, male, female, area,mortality,infant,male,female,area

  • Deaths involving MRSA in Wales: 2013

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 3 September 2014

    Deaths where Meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) was mentioned on the death certificate by sex, age group and whether the death occured in hospital or elsewhere.

    Keywords: Meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, S. aureus, hospital infections, care home infections, superbug

  • Deaths Registered in England and Wales: 2013

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 16 July 2014

    Deaths, stillbirths and infant mortality including death rates, causes, age, and area of residence.

    Keywords: mortality, by age, by sex, by area, infant deaths

  • Deaths involving MRSA: 2008 to 2012 (Latest release)

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 22 August 2013

    Deaths where Meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) was mentioned on the death certificate by sex, age group and whether the death occured in hospital or elsewhere.

    Keywords: Meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, S. aureus, hospital infections, care home infections, superbug

  • Deaths Registered in England and Wales: 2012

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 10 July 2013

    Deaths, stillbirths and infant mortality including death rates, causes, age, and area of residence.

    Keywords: mortality, by age, by sex, by area, infant deaths

  • Alcohol-specific deaths in the UK: registered in 2016 (Latest release)

    Statistical bulletin | Released on 7 November 2017

    Deaths in the UK which are known to be direct consequences of alcohol misuse.

    Keywords: drinking, mortality, alcoholism, by sex, by age, by region
